fields.name: Pilk (1x, 150%):
fields.value: Attack the target with your standard deviation added to your attack score, against their standard deviation added to their defense score.

fields.name: Lean (0x, 100%):
fields.value: Use at night. Target anyone you’ve placed above. Lower their defense power by a third the following night.

fields.name: Graveyard (0x, 200%):
fields.value: Use alongside factional poison. In addition to the effects of factional poison on your target, all visitors will be hit with your attack score, divided evenly per visitor.

fields.name: Beverage Of The Gods (Locked, 1x):
fields.value: Unlock by placing in the top three. Use a boosted attack power of 1.5x on any target, roleblocking them at the same time. If they survive however, they may ask the host any one question, and receive the truthful answer. If the host must refuse, they can, but the target may continue to ask other questions until they receive an answer. Questions for the precise role of more than one player, “everyone’s alignments,” or similarly singlehandedly game-solving information should not be answered.
